scripts.build-vercel: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:front
scripts.build: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:back && pnpm run build:front
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:shared" "pnpm run dev:back" "pnpm run dev:front"
scripts.lag:up: sudo tc qdisc add dev lo root netem delay 100ms
scripts.lag:down: sudo tc qdisc del dev lo root netem
